name: Zombie Invasion (steevenq)
description:
Zombie Invasion is a 2D topdown survival and shooter game made with Unity and C#. Your goal in this game is to survive as long as possible, using your weapons to defend yourself and supply boxes to heal or replenish ammo. You can see my assets or source code here.

Movement Controls

W - Move Up
S - Move Down
A - Move Left
D - Move Right

 Weapon Controls

Left Mouse - Use Weapon
R - Reload
1 - Knife
2 - Pistol
3 - Rifle
4 - Shotgun

Hotkeys

P/Esc - Pause
